revision.text: ==Galician== [[File:Barrio xudeu. Ribadavia- Galiza-2.jpg |thumb |Barrio ''xudeu'', ancient Jewish quarter, Ribadavia, Galicia]] ===Etymology=== From Old Galician and {{inh|gl|roa-opt|judeu}}, {{m|roa-opt|judio}}, from {{der|gl|la|iudaeus|t=Judaean}}, from {{der|gl|grc|Ἰουδαῖος}}, from {{der|gl|he|יהודי||tr=Yehudi}}. Cognate with {{cog|pt|judeu}} and {{cog|es|judío}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|gl|/ʃuˈðew/}} ===Noun=== {{gl-noun|m|f=xudía}} # [[Jew]] #* '''c1350''', K. M. Parker (ed.), ''Historia Troyana.'' Santiago: Instituto "Padre Sarmiento", page 185: #*: ''el RRey Faraõ, o que morreu ẽno mar RRubio quando ya pos los '''judeus''''' #*:: the Pharaoh king, the one who died at the Red Sea when going after the '''Jews''' #* '''1390''', J. L. Pensado Tomé (ed.), ''Os Miragres de Santiago. Versión gallega del Códice latino del siglo XII atribuido al papa Calisto I''. Madrid: C.S.I.C., page 216: #*: ''Hu he aquel que he nado Rrey dos '''judeus'''? que nos vimos a estrela en ouriente, et vymoslo adorar'' #*:: Where is he who is born King of the '''Jews'''? Because in the East we saw the star and came here to adore him. #* '''1487''', X. Ferro Couselo (ed.), ''A vida e a fala dos devanceiros. Escolma de documentos en galego dos séculos XIII ao XVI''. Vigo: Galaxia, page 235: #*: ''querendo cunplir e aguardar la ley quel Rey e Reyna nros señores avían feito, en que se contyña que suas Alteças mandauan apartar e faser apartamento en todos seus regnos a los '''judíos''' pera que morasen apartados de los cristiaos'' #*:: wanting to accomplish and to obey the law that our lords, the king and queen, have made, which contained this: that our Highnesses ordered to separate and made a separate quarter, in all of their kingdoms, for the '''Jews''', for them to live apart from the Christians ===Adjective=== {{gl-adj|m|f=xudía}} # [[Jewish]] ===References=== * {{R:gl:DDGM|judeu}} * “[http://sli.uvigo.es/xelmirez/xelmirez.php?pescuda=+jud%5Bei%C3%AD%5D%5Boua%5D&corpus=xelmirez judeu]” in Xavier Varela Barreiro & Xavier Gómez Guinovart: ''Corpus Xelmírez - Corpus lingüístico da Galicia medieval''.
